name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Java Engineer with 8 years of experience in the finance sector, specializing in the development of robust applications using **Java**, **Kotlin**, **Scala**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proven expertise in employing **GCP** for cloud services, alongside container orchestration with **Kubernetes** and monitoring using **Grafana**, **Prometheus**, and **NewRelic**. Well-versed in Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery (CI/CD) practices, with a focus on Test-Driven Development (TDD) and Domain-Driven Design (DDD) methodologies.

Strong team collaborator and communicator, bringing organizational skills to manage product-focused development in a startup environment. Leveraging my foundation in microservices architecture and event-driven systems, I ensure the delivery of high-performance and secure software solutions tailored to client needs.
